snippet: Slowly, I adjusted my thinking. I asked myself, “What are the things in my power I can do to make him happy?”
abstract: Tara Ebrahimi Modern Love column describes how she, a Persian-American, came to terms with her brother's mental illness and explains some of the small things she does to make him momentarily happy.
lead_paragraph: Slowly, I adjusted my thinking. I asked myself, “What are the things in my power I can do to make him happy?”

headline.seo: Modern Love - Providing Comfort When a Cure Is Out of Reach
headline.main: A Sister’s Comfort, if Not a Cure
headline.print_headline: A Sister’s Comfort, if Not a Cure
